subject: Golf
Walker Cup (Golf)
organizations: National Golf Links of America (Southampton, NY)
lead_paragraph: Matt Fitzpatrick, the reigning United States Amateur champion, is on the Britain and Ireland team as the Walker Cup returns to its original site, the National Golf Links of America.
snippet: Matt Fitzpatrick, the reigning United States Amateur champion, is on the Britain and Ireland team as the Walker Cup returns to its original site, the National Golf Links of America.
